channel.title: Crash upon game opening.
channel.description:
im sure you have seen this issue before, however i have tried everything over a 2 days period, read alot of threads, tried alot of methods, nothing seems to work.
i am using Windows 7 and have run steam as an administrator, deleted BMS entirely and did a fresh download, re-installed 3 times, deleted Source SDK base 2007 and re-installed several times, i did a condump and i got this: [code]maxplayers set to 1 Steam config directory: D:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Source SDK Base 2007\platform\config Legacy Surround disabled. exec: couldn't exec userconfig.cfg Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL NPC generic_actor stuck in wall--level design error at (-1151.00 8016.00 -127.00) Redownloading all lightmaps Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\halflife2.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\halflife2.ttf on attempt 2. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\halflife2.ttf on attempt 3. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\hl2ep2.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\hl2ep2.ttf on attempt 2. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\hl2ep2.ttf on attempt 3. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\hl2crosshairs.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\sourcemods\bms\resource\blackmesa.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\sourcemods\bms\resource\din1451m.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\sourcemods\bms\resource\svbasicmanual-bold.ttf on attempt 1. Reference Count for Material ___error (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material vgui_white (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material vgui_3dpaint_fullscreen__rt_fullscreen (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __background (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __loading (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __particlesdepthwrite (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __particlesdepthwrite (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __lookupviewpanel (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material __ep2stuneffect (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material __ep1introeffect (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material __stuneffect (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material debug/debugempty (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material debug/debugwireframe (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material debug/debugtranslucentsinglecolor (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material debug/debugtranslucent +more and more and more lines of reference counting[/code]
but i doubt that would cause any trouble.
i have tested other mods and other source mods have the same issue, including mods that have been greenlit and are on steam, HL2 games, Episodes, TF2, CS:S, CS:GO and all other related games boot and work 100% fine, have also tried deleting the clientregistry.blob, still no change.
tried forcing -window, still crashed, tried setting resolution with -width 1920 -height 1080, still no good, tried setting -dxlevel, still crashes, pretty much out of options on what to do.
any help would be appreaciated, cheers.

item.title: Crash upon game opening.
item.dc:creator: dr.grumbles
item.description:
im sure you have seen this issue before, however i have tried everything over a 2 days period, read alot of threads, tried alot of methods, nothing seems to work.

i am using Windows 7 and have run steam as an administrator, deleted BMS entirely and did a fresh download, re-installed 3 times, deleted Source SDK base 2007 and re-installed several times, i did a condump and i got this:

maxplayers set to 1 Steam config directory: D:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\Source SDK Base 2007\platform\config Legacy Surround disabled. exec: couldn't exec userconfig.cfg Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL Attempting to precache model, but model name is NULL NPC generic_actor stuck in wall--level design error at (-1151.00 8016.00 -127.00) Redownloading all lightmaps Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\halflife2.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\halflife2.ttf on attempt 2. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\halflife2.ttf on attempt 3. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\hl2ep2.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\hl2ep2.ttf on attempt 2. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\hl2ep2.ttf on attempt 3. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\common\source sdk base 2007\hl2\resource\hl2crosshairs.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\sourcemods\bms\resource\blackmesa.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\sourcemods\bms\resource\din1451m.ttf on attempt 1. Removed font resource d:\program files\steam\steamapps\sourcemods\bms\resource\svbasicmanual-bold.ttf on attempt 1. Reference Count for Material ___error (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material vgui_white (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material vgui_3dpaint_fullscreen__rt_fullscreen (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __background (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __loading (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __particlesdepthwrite (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __particlesdepthwrite (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material __lookupviewpanel (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material __ep2stuneffect (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material __ep1introeffect (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material __stuneffect (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material debug/debugempty (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material debug/debugwireframe (1) != 0 Reference Count for Material debug/debugtranslucentsinglecolor (2) != 0 Reference Count for Material debug/debugtranslucent +more and more and more lines of reference counting

but i doubt that would cause any trouble.

i have tested other mods and other source mods have the same issue, including mods that have been greenlit and are on steam, HL2 games, Episodes, TF2, CS:S, CS:GO and all other related games boot and work 100% fine, have also tried deleting the clientregistry.blob, still no change.

tried forcing -window, still crashed, tried setting resolution with -width 1920 -height 1080, still no good, tried setting -dxlevel, still crashes, pretty much out of options on what to do.

any help would be appreaciated, cheers.
